Age is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Uses

Age is used by the model in the following places


#### Guidance

The user input is a typed number and should answer the question

> How old are you today?

The unit of the input is **Years**, but can be changed to any of the units below

* Days (1 Years = 365.25 Days)

The answer has to be larger than 0 Years. The answer is recommended to be larger than 0 Years and smaller than 110 Years. Input you age rounded down to the nearest whole number. 


### Optimizability

[Optimizability](/model/optimizabilities) is a subjective measure that we have made to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Age is 1. This means that it can be interpreted as

> *It is impossible to change and it has never been in your control*
